plot: A short portrait piece on the filmmaker's father, Oscar San Luis, as he reflects on his boyhood love for bike riding after immigrating to Los Angeles from the Philippines.
title: Flying
plot_es: A short portrait piece on the filmmaker's father, Oscar San Luis, as he reflects on his boyhood love for bike riding after immigrating to Los Angeles from the Philippines.
